ground_truth: Cal steps on a piece of broken banister and falls. He stands, picks up the gun, and runs after them. Jack and Rose run to the bottom of the staircase. Cal aims but doesn't fire. He knocks a man out of his way, then shoots again. Jack and Rose run down another staircase, then jump into waist-high water. Cal runs into the water. Jack and Rose hurry into the dining room. Cal aims, but the gun is empty. Cal looks around himself at the rising water. Jack and Rose run through the dining room. Cal climbs several steps, then stops. He chuckles to himself as Lovejoy appears. Rose and Jack run down a passageway. They turn, then run down more stairs. Stopping, Jack presses his finger to his mouth. In the dining room, a glass door swings slowly through the water. Small waves push plates and silverware, as rising water covers the tables and chairs. Rose and Jack step into another passageway. At the far end, a small boy stands against a wall. Water pours down the steps, and then they run towards the boy. Sparks shoot from an overhead pipe. Jack picks up the boy, then watches as water shoots in from cracks. They turn and run back up the passageway. They stop as water rushes into the passageway ahead of them. As they run in the opposite direction, a man, the boy's father, steps into the hall. The man grabs the boy from Jack, then knocks Jack against a wall. The man runs off with the boy, and Jack and Rose run after him. The man picks up a suitcase, then gapes at the door, which bursts. Water rushes in, knocking the man over. Water rushes after them as they run down the passageway. A wave knocks them over, and rushing water carries them away. Water pours around them as lights flicker. Jack struggles against the current toward a stairwell. They pull themselves along a wall toward the stairwell. Jack pushes Rose through the shoulder-high water toward the railing. Rose grabs the railings and climbs to another locked gate. Jack shakes the gate as the water rises below them. The water reaches their feet. A steward runs past them. The steward returns for them. He tries several keys in the lock, as water swirls around them. The water reaches their thighs. Sparks shoot nearby. The steward fumbles with the keys and then drops underwater. Holding onto the grate with one hand, he reaches for the keys. Jack grabs the keys, then resurfaces. Jack reaches around the grate with the key, but misses the lock. He slips the key into the lock. He turns the key. Rose opens the gate.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Cal treads on a fragment of shattered railing and tumbles. He rises, grabs the pistol, and sprints after them. Jack and Rose dash to the base of the stairway. Cal targets but doesn't discharge. He shoves a man out of his path, then fires again. Jack and Rose descend another stairway, then leap into waist-deep water. Cal dashes into the water. Jack and Rose hasten into the banquet room. Cal targets, but the pistol is vacant. Cal gazes around himself at the escalating water. Jack and Rose dash through the banquet room. Cal ascends numerous stairs, then pauses. He snickers to himself as Lovejoy emerges. Rose and Jack dash down a corridor. They pivot, then dash down additional stairs. Halting, Jack presses his digit to his lips. In the banquet room, a glass portal swings leisurely through the water. Small ripples propel dishes and utensils, as escalating water submerges the tables and seats. Rose and Jack step into another corridor. At the distant end, a small child stands against a barrier. Water cascades down the stairs, and then they dash towards the child. Sparks erupt from an overhead conduit. Jack grabs the child, then observes as water erupts in from fissures. They pivot and dash back up the corridor. They halt as water surges into the corridor ahead of them. As they dash in the opposite direction, a man, the child's parent, steps into the hall. The man seizes the child from Jack, then shoves Jack against a barrier. The man dashes off with the child, and Jack and Rose dash after him. The man grabs a valise, then stares at the portal, which bursts. Water surges in, toppling the man. Water surges after them as they dash down the corridor. A swell topples them, and surging water carries them away. Water cascades around them as lights flicker. Jack struggles against the flow toward a stairwell. They pull themselves along a barrier toward the stairwell. Jack pushes Rose through the shoulder-deep water toward the railing. Rose grabs the railings and ascends to another locked barrier. Jack shakes the barrier as the water escalates below them. The water reaches their feet. A steward dashes past them. The steward returns for them. He tries several keys in the lock, as water swirls around them. The water reaches their thighs. Sparks erupt nearby. The steward fumbles with the keys and then drops underwater. Holding onto the grate with one hand, he reaches for the keys. Jack grabs the keys, then resurfaces. Jack reaches around the grate with the key, but misses the lock. He slips the key into the lock. He turns the key. Rose opens the barrier.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: A piece of broken banister is stepped on by Cal, causing him to fall. He stands, the gun is picked up by him, and they are pursued by him. To the bottom of the staircase, Jack and Rose are run by Cal. The gun is aimed by Cal but not fired. A man is knocked out of his way by him, then another shot is fired by him. Another staircase is descended by Jack and Rose, and into waist-high water, they jump. The water is run into by Cal. Into the dining room, Jack and Rose hurry. Cal aims, but it is found empty, the gun. Around himself, Cal looks at the rising water. Through the dining room, Jack and Rose are run by him. Several steps are climbed by Cal, then he stops. He chuckles to himself as Lovejoy appears. Down a passageway, Rose and Jack run. They turn, and more stairs are run down by them. Stopping, a finger is pressed to his mouth by Jack. In the dining room, a glass door is swung slowly through the water. Plates and silverware are pushed by small waves, as tables and chairs are covered by the rising water. Another passageway is stepped into by Rose and Jack. At the far end, against a wall, a small boy is seen standing. Down the steps, water pours, and then towards the boy, they run. Sparks are shot from an overhead pipe. The boy is picked up by Jack, then he watches as water is shot in from cracks. They turn and the passageway is run back up by them. They stop as the passageway ahead of them is rushed into by water. As the opposite direction is run in, the boy's father steps into the hall. The boy is grabbed by the man from Jack, then Jack is knocked against a wall by the man. With the boy, the man runs off, and after him, Jack and Rose run. A suitcase is picked up by the man, and then he gapes at the door, which bursts. Into the man, water rushes, knocking him over. After them, water rushes as the passageway is run down by them. They are knocked over by a wave, and away they are carried by rushing water. Around them, water pours as the lights flicker. Toward a stairwell, Jack struggles against the current. Along a wall toward the stairwell, they pull themselves. Through the shoulder-high water toward the railing, Jack pushes Rose. The railings are grabbed by Rose and another locked gate is climbed to. The gate is shaken by Jack as below them, the water rises. Their feet are reached by the water. Past them, a steward runs. For them, the steward returns. Several keys are tried in the lock by him, as around them, water swirls. Their thighs are reached by the water. Nearby, sparks shoot. The keys are fumbled with by the steward and then underwater, they are dropped. Onto the grate with one hand, he holds, reaching for the keys. The keys are grabbed by Jack, then he resurfaces. Around the grate with the key, Jack reaches, but the lock is missed. Into the lock, the key is slipped. The key is turned by him. The gate is opened by Rose.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Cal steps on a broken banister and falls but grabs the gun to pursue them. Jack and Rose reach the staircase bottom; Cal aims but doesn't shoot. He knocks a man aside, firing again. Jack and Rose descend another staircase into waist-high water, followed by Cal. In the dining room, Cal's gun is empty. Observing the rising water, Jack and Rose run through. Cal climbs some steps, then pauses, chuckling as Lovejoy appears. Rose and Jack run down corridors and stairs. Jack signals silence. In the dining room, a glass door swings in the water, moving plates and silverware as water covers tables and chairs. They enter another passageway, spotting a boy against a wall. Water pours on the steps as they run. Sparks fly from a pipe. Jack carries the boy as water seeps in. They retreat. Water rushes ahead. As they turn, the boy's father arrives, takes the boy, and knocks Jack aside. The man retrieves a suitcase, astonished as water bursts through a door, knocking him over. Water follows Jack and Rose. A wave overwhelms them, carrying them away. Water surrounds them as lights flicker. Jack fights the current toward the stairwell. They move along the wall. Jack pushes Rose through the water to the railing. She climbs to a locked gate. Jack shakes it as water rises. A steward hurries by, returning to help. He tries keys in the lock as water swirls, reaching their thighs. Sparks fly as the steward fumbles and drops underwater. Grabbing the grate, he retrieves the keys. Jack resurfaces and attempts the lock. He inserts the key and unlocks the gate; Rose opens it.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Cal steps on a broken banister, falls, stands, grabs the gun, and chases them. Jack and Rose run downstairs. Cal aims but doesn't fire, knocks a man aside, and shoots again. Jack and Rose jump into waist-high water, with Cal following. They enter the dining room, Cal aims, but the gun is empty. Water rises around Cal. Jack and Rose proceed, while Cal ascends steps, chuckling as Lovejoy arrives. Rose and Jack go down a passage, then more stairs. Jack signals silence. In the dining room, water moves plates and covers the furniture. Rose and Jack enter another passage, see a boy, and run to him as sparks fly. Jack carries the boy, watching water pour in. They run back, but water blocks their path. They turn and encounter the boy's father, who takes the boy and knocks Jack. The man grabs a suitcase, stunned as water bursts through a door, sweeping him away. Jack and Rose are also carried by water. They reach a stairwell, struggle against the current, and climb toward a locked gate. Jack shakes the gate as water rises. A steward tries unlocking it. With water rising, he drops the keys, then dives. Jack retrieves the keys, resurfaces, and unlocks the gate. Rose opens it.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Cal, moving with determination but unaware of the hazard, steps onto a piece of broken banister. This misstep causes him to fall. Recovering quickly from the fall, he stands up, retrieves his gun, and resumes his pursuit. Jack and Rose, in a desperate attempt to escape, dash to the bottom of the staircase. Cal takes aim at them, yet for some reason, he refrains from pulling the trigger. In his hurried chase, he shoves a man out of his path and fires another shot. Jack and Rose find themselves descending another set of stairs, ultimately leaping into water that reaches their waists. Unfazed, Cal continues his chase, splashing through the water. Jack and Rose make their way hurriedly into a grand dining room. Cal tries to aim again, but to his frustration, the gun is empty. Observing the water rising ominously around him, Cal pauses, looking slightly amused. Meanwhile, Lovejoy makes an appearance. Rose and Jack continue their flight, rushing through a narrow passageway. They pause momentarily, then swiftly descend more stairs. Halting, Jack gestures for silence by placing a finger to his lips. In the dining room, amid the chaos, a glass door swings eerily through the water. Small waves ripple gently, pushing plates and silverware, while the water steadily covers tables and chairs. Rose and Jack find themselves in another passageway. At the far end, they spot a small boy standing defensively against a wall. Water cascades down the steps, prompting them to sprint toward the boy. Sparks ignite dramatically from an overhead pipe, adding to the chaos. Jack picks the boy up, looking around as water begins to shoot in from cracks. The trio turns and urgently heads back up the passageway. Their progress is halted as water surges into the passageway ahead of them. As they scramble in the opposite direction, a man, presumably the boy's father, steps into the corridor. The man swiftly takes the boy from Jack, knocking Jack against the wall in the process. He then hastens away with his son, while Jack and Rose pursue him frantically. The man picks up a suitcase, shocked to see the door burst open. Water comes flooding in, knocking him over forcefully. Water follows Jack and Rose as they flee down the passageway. A sudden wave overtakes them, with rushing water carrying them along. As water cascades around them, lights flicker ominously. Battling the current, Jack struggles toward a stairwell. They manage to pull themselves along a wall, striving to reach the stairwell. Jack pushes Rose through the shoulder-high water toward the safety of the railing. She seizes the railings, climbing toward yet another locked gate. With urgency, Jack shakes the gate as the water rises steadily below. The water ascends to their feet, heightening the tension. A steward runs past them, but soon returns to assist them. Frantically, he tries several keys in the lock as water swirls relentlessly around them. The water now reaches their thighs. Sparks fly dramatically from nearby. The steward, fumbling with the keys, drops them into the water. Desperately holding onto the grate with one hand, he reaches underwater for the keys. Jack manages to grab the keys, then resurfaces. He awkwardly reaches around the grate with a key, but misses the lock initially. Finally, he fits the key into the lock, and with a turn, unlocks it. Rose seizes the opportunity to open the gate.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Cal, moving with a sense of determination yet completely unaware of the lurking hazard, steps onto a precarious piece of broken banister. This unfortunate misstep causes him to plummet to the ground. Recovering quickly and regaining his composure after the fall, he stands up, retrieves his gun with a steady hand, and resumes his relentless pursuit with renewed vigor. Meanwhile, Jack and Rose, driven by a desperate attempt to escape their pursuer, dash frantically to the bottom of the grand staircase. Cal takes careful aim at them, yet, inexplicably, he refrains from pulling the trigger. In his hurried and frantic chase, he forcefully shoves a bystander out of his path and fires another shot with determination. Jack and Rose inevitably find themselves descending another perilous set of stairs, ultimately leaping into water that reaches their waists. Undeterred and unbothered by this, Cal continues his chase unabated, splashing aggressively through the rising water. Jack and Rose make their way hurriedly into an extravagant, grand dining room. Cal attempts to aim once more, but to his growing frustration, the gun is empty. Observing the water rising ominously around him, Cal pauses momentarily, looking slightly amused by the situation. Meanwhile, Lovejoy makes an unexpected appearance. Rose and Jack continue their frantic flight, rushing through a narrow passageway. They pause momentarily, then swiftly descend more stairs with urgency. Halting momentarily, Jack gestures for silence by placing a finger to his lips, indicating the need for quiet. In the dining room, amid the chaos unfolding, a glass door swings eerily through the invading water. Small waves ripple gently, pushing plates and silverware along, while the water steadily manages to cover the tables and chairs. Rose and Jack find themselves navigating another passageway. At the far end, they spot a small boy standing defensively against the wall. Water cascades down the steps, prompting them to sprint hurriedly toward the boy. Sparks ignite dramatically from an overhead pipe, adding to the chaos and intensity of the scene. Jack picks the boy up, looking around frantically as water begins to shoot in through the cracks. The trio turns with urgency and heads back up the passageway. Their progress is suddenly halted as water surges menacingly into the passageway ahead of them. As they scramble in the opposite direction, a man, presumably the boy's father, steps into the corridor. The man swiftly takes the boy from Jack, knocking Jack against the wall in the process. He then hastens away with his son, while Jack and Rose pursue him frantically, eager not to lose them. The man hurriedly picks up a suitcase, shocked to witness the door burst open violently. Water comes flooding in, knocking him over forcefully. Water follows Jack and Rose persistently as they flee down the passageway. Suddenly, a powerful wave overtakes them, with rushing water carrying them along. As water cascades all around them, lights flicker ominously, adding to the tension. Battling against the aggressive current, Jack struggles determinedly toward a nearby stairwell. They manage to pull themselves along a wall, striving arduously to reach the desperately needed stairwell. Jack pushes Rose through the shoulder-high water toward the safety of the railing. She seizes the railings tightly, climbing toward yet another seemingly locked gate. With a sense of urgency, Jack shakes the gate as the water rises steadily below them. The water ascends to their feet, heightening the sense of tension and desperation. A steward runs past them in haste, but soon returns to assist them. Frantically working together, he tries several keys in the lock as water swirls relentlessly around them. The water now reaches their thighs, creating a sense of impending danger. Sparks fly dramatically from nearby, adding to the chaos. The steward, fumbling nervously with the keys, accidentally drops them into the swirling water. Desperately holding onto the grate with one hand, he reaches underwater for the keys. Jack manages to grab the keys, then resurfaces triumphantly. He awkwardly reaches around the grate with a key, but misses the lock initially. Finally, with determination, he fits the key into the lock, and with a decisive turn, unlocks it. Rose seizes the opportunity quickly to open the gate.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Cal, while moving quickly, inadvertently steps onto a splintered piece of the broken banister, losing his balance and falling to the ground. Determined, he promptly stands up, takes a moment to steady himself, and retrieves the gun he dropped in the process. Without hesitation, he dashes forward in pursuit of his targets, Jack and Rose, who are making their way rapidly to the bottom of a staircase. As Cal aims his gun with precision, he decides not to fire just yet and instead forcefully pushes a man out of his path, clearing his way. He then discharges the weapon again with intent. Meanwhile, Jack and Rose hurriedly descend another staircase and, without a second thought, leap into water that reaches up to their waists. Cal, undeterred, rushes into the cold, waist-high water after them. Jack and Rose move swiftly into the dining room, with Cal closely trailing behind. When Cal takes aim once more, he realizes that his gun is empty and pauses to assess the situation, glancing around to see the water steadily rising around him. Jack and Rose weave their way through the dining room with urgency, while Cal, momentarily resigned, ascends several steps before stopping abruptly. He lets out a dry chuckle as his associate, Lovejoy, makes an appearance. Rose and Jack sprint down a long passageway and, upon reaching a junction, turn sharply before racing down another flight of stairs. Coming to a halt, Jack signals Rose to be silent by pressing his finger to his lips. In the dining room, a glass door, moved by the encroaching water, slowly swings back and forth, creating small waves that gently nudge plates and silverware as the rising water begins to submerge tables and chairs. Rose and Jack cautiously enter another passageway, spotting a small boy standing alone against a wall at the far end. They notice water pouring relentlessly down the steps and without delay, run toward the boy. Just then, sparks erupt from an overhead pipe, adding to the chaos. Jack quickly scoops up the boy, taking a moment to survey the scene as water forcefully bursts through the cracks. They pivot and sprint back up the passageway, only to stop abruptly when they see water surging in the direction ahead of them. They pivot once more and run the other way, encountering the boy’s father as he steps into the hall. The man snatches his son from Jack’s arms and, in a moment of panic, shoves Jack against the wall before fleeing with the boy. Jack and Rose give chase, following the man who pauses to grab a suitcase, then freezes in shock as the door bursts open, unleashing a torrent of water that knocks him over. Water begins to pursue them aggressively as they dash down the passageway. A powerful wave overtakes them, causing them to lose their footing as the rushing water sweeps them away with force. Amidst the chaos, water streams around them and the lights flicker erratically. Jack fights against the relentless current, inching toward a stairwell. Together, they cling to the wall, using it to pull themselves toward safety. Jack then propels Rose through the chest-deep water toward the railing of the stairway. Rose grips the railings tightly, pulling herself up to reach another gate that is locked. Jack shakes the gate in frustration as the water level continues to rise beneath them, eventually reaching their feet. A steward appears, rushing past them, but then circles back to offer assistance. He attempts to fit several keys into the lock, all the while water whirls around the group. The water now rises to their thighs, and nearby, another burst of sparks adds urgency to the moment. The steward, in his frantic efforts, accidentally drops the keys into the water. He plunges his hand underwater to retrieve them, all the while holding onto the gate with one hand. Jack seizes the keys from the steward, resurfaces, and urgently stretches his arm around the grate, attempting but initially missing the lock. With determination, he finally manages to insert the key into the lock, turning it with a breathless twist. Rose wastes no time in swinging the gate open, allowing them to escape just in time.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Cal accidentally steps on a broken banister piece and falls. After quickly recovering and picking up his gun, he chases after Jack and Rose, who have reached the bottom of a staircase. Cal aims but doesn't fire, instead forcefully pushing a man aside before shooting again. As Jack and Rose descend another staircase and plunge into waist-high water, Cal follows them into the water. In the dining room, Cal aims again, realizing his gun is empty as water rises around him. Meanwhile, Jack and Rose hurry through the dining room; Cal stops on the steps, chuckling as Lovejoy arrives. Jack and Rose sprint down a passageway, take a turn, and descend more stairs. Jack pauses to signal silence. The dining room's glass door swings in the water, with small waves moving plates and silverware as water covers tables and chairs. Jack and Rose enter another passageway, spotting a small boy at the far end as water cascades down the steps. As sparks fly from an overhead pipe, Jack picks up the boy and they retreat up the passageway. They stop as water floods in, then run back, encountering the boy's father who snatches the boy from Jack, knocking him against a wall. The father flees with the boy, and Jack and Rose pursue him. The father, now holding a suitcase, stares at a door as it bursts, sending water crashing in and knocking him down. Pursued by the rushing water, Jack and Rose run but are eventually knocked over and swept away by a wave. Struggling against the current toward a stairwell, they pull themselves along a wall. Jack helps Rose through shoulder-high water toward a railing; she climbs to a locked gate. Water rising to their feet, a steward arrives and tries multiple keys in the lock as water swirls around them, reaching their thighs. Sparks fly as the steward drops the keys underwater. Jack retrieves the keys, resurfaces, and attempts to unlock the gate. Finally, he turns the key, and Rose opens the gate.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Cal steps on a piece of broken banister from the ship's grand staircase, known for its elaborate design and craftsmanship, and falls. He stands, picks up the gun, a small revolver issued to first-class passengers for emergencies, and runs after them. Jack and Rose run to the bottom of the staircase, which had been a popular gathering spot before the chaos began. Cal aims but doesn't fire, deciding perhaps to conserve his dwindling ammunition. He knocks a man out of his way, then shoots again, this time with the desperation of someone trapped on the rapidly sinking Titanic. Jack and Rose run down another staircase, then jump into waist-high water that has begun flooding the lower decks. Cal runs into the water, feeling the icy chill that passengers had been warned about in lifeboat drills. Jack and Rose hurry into the once-elegant dining room, now eerily lit by flickering lights. Cal aims, but the gun is empty, its last bullet fired in vain. Cal looks around himself at the rising water, a reminder of the catastrophic iceberg collision that had ripped the ship open. Jack and Rose run through the dining room, where the remnants of an elegant dinner now float uselessly. Cal climbs several steps to gain higher ground, then stops as he chuckles to himself, seeing Lovejoy, his loyal valet. Rose and Jack run down a passageway that would have once led to opulent staterooms. They turn, then run down more stairs, navigating the maze-like corridors. Stopping, Jack presses his finger to his mouth, signaling Rose to stay silent as they hear the distant groans of the ship. In the dining room, a glass door swings slowly through the water, reminiscent of the ship's once-glamorous days. Small waves push plates and silverware, once polished and set for the elite, as rising water covers the tables and chairs. Rose and Jack step into another passageway, where the decor hints at the ship's grandeur. At the far end, a small boy stands against a wall, his eyes wide with fear. Water pours down the steps, a torrent entering through breached hull sections, and then they run towards the boy. Sparks shoot from an overhead pipe, severed by the ship's violent movements. Jack picks up the boy, then watches as water shoots in from cracks, further tearing apart the ship’s structure. They turn and run back up the passageway, their path quickly being overtaken by water. They stop as water rushes into the passageway ahead of them, leaving them with no escape. As they run in the opposite direction, a man, the boy's father, steps into the hall, desperate to find his child amidst the chaos. The man grabs the boy from Jack, then knocks Jack against a wall, driven by primal panic. The man runs off with the boy, and Jack and Rose run after him, following the only route they believe might still be open. The man picks up a suitcase, filled perhaps with valuables he can't bear to leave behind, then gapes at the door, which bursts open under the pressure. Water rushes in, knocking the man over in its powerful surge. Water rushes after them as they run down the passageway, the deluge relentless. A wave knocks them over, and rushing water carries them away, testing their endurance. Water pours around them as lights flicker, the ship’s electrical systems failing. Jack struggles against the current toward a stairwell, his determination fueled by the will to survive. They pull themselves along a wall toward the stairwell, knowing it's their only chance. Jack pushes Rose through the shoulder-high water toward the railing that leads to a higher deck. Rose grabs the railings and climbs to another locked gate, a barrier meant for security now turned into a potential trap. Jack shakes the gate as the water rises below them, threatening to engulf them. The water reaches their feet as they struggle for time. A steward runs past them, part of a crew trained for such emergencies. The steward returns for them, holding the keys that could mean their salvation. He tries several keys in the lock, as water swirls around them, rising with unstoppable force. The water reaches their thighs, inching closer with every passing second. Sparks shoot nearby, highlighting the urgency of their plight. The steward fumbles with the keys and then drops underwater, his grip slipping as the ship lists. Holding onto the grate with one hand, he reaches for the keys, a lifeline now in Jack's possession. Jack grabs the keys, then resurfaces, the cold water numbing his senses. Jack reaches around the grate with the key, but misses the lock, each second crucial. He slips the key into the lock, his heart pounding. He turns the key, feeling a surge of hope. Rose opens the gate, allowing them a chance at escape from the sinking vessel.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: Cal steps on a piece of broken banister and falls. He stands picks up the gun and runs after them. Jack and Rose run to the bottom of the staircase. Cal aims but does not fire. He knocks a man out of his way then shoots again. Jack and Rose run down another staircase then jump into waisthigh water. Cal runs into the water. Jack and Rose hurry into the dining room. Cal aims but the gun is empty. Cal looks around himself at the rising water. Jack and Rose run through the dining room. Cal climbs several steps then stops. He chuckles to himself as Lovejoy appears. Rose and Jack run down a passageway. They turn then run down more stairs. Stopping Jack presses his finger to his mouth. In the dining room a glass door swings slowly through the water. Small waves push plates and silverware as rising water covers the tables and chairs. Rose and Jack step into another passageway. At the far end a small boy stands against a wall. Water pours down the steps and then they run towards the boy. Sparks shoot from an overhead pipe. Jack picks up the boy then watches as water shoots in from cracks. They turn and run back up the passageway. They stop as water rushes into the passageway ahead of them. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. As they run in the opposite direction a man the boy's father steps into the hall. The man grabs the boy from Jack then knocks Jack against a wall. The man runs off with the boy and Jack and Rose run after him. The man picks up a suitcase then gapes at the door which bursts. Water rushes in knocking the man over. Water rushes after them as they run down the passageway. A wave knocks them over and rushing water carries them away. Water pours around them as lights flicker. Jack struggles against the current toward a stairwell. They pull themselves along a wall toward the stairwell. Jack pushes Rose through the shoulderhigh water toward the railing. Rose grabs the railings and climbs to another locked gate. Jack shakes the gate as the water rises below them. The water reaches their feet. A steward runs past them. The steward returns for them. He tries several keys in the lock as water swirls around them. The water reaches their thighs. Sparks shoot nearby. The steward fumbles with the keys and then drops underwater. Holding onto the grate with one hand he reaches for the keys. Jack grabs the keys then resurfaces. Jack reaches around the grate with the key but misses the lock. He slips the key into the lock. He turns the key. Rose opens the gate.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: Cal steps on a piece of broken banister and falls. He stands picks up the gun and runs after them. Jack and Rose run to the bottom of the staircase. Cal aims but does not fire. He knocks a man out of his way then shoots again. Jack and Rose run down another staircase then jump into waisthigh water. Cal runs into the water. Jack and Rose hurry into the dining room. Cal aims but the gun is empty. Cal looks around himself at the rising water. Jack and Rose run through the dining room. Cal climbs several steps then stops. He chuckles to himself as Lovejoy appears. Rose and Jack run down a passageway. They turn then run down more stairs. Stopping Jack presses his finger to his mouth. In the dining room a glass door swings slowly through the water. Small waves push plates and silverware as rising water covers the tables and chairs. Rose and Jack step into another passageway. At the far end a small boy stands against a wall. Water pours down the steps and then they run towards the boy. Sparks shoot from an overhead pipe. Jack picks up the boy then watches as water shoots in from cracks. They turn and run back up the passageway. They stop as water rushes into the passageway ahead of them. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Ben stumbles on a stray shoelace and trips. He rises, grabs the umbrella, and dashes after them. Tom and Lily sprint to the end of the hallway. Ben aims but doesn't throw. He nudges a waiter out of his path, then tosses the umbrella again. Tom and Lily skip down another hallway, then leap into knee-deep mud. Ben charges into the mud. Tom and Lily race into the ballroom. Ben aims, but the umbrella is broken. Ben glances around at the falling sand. Tom and Lily dart through the ballroom. Ben climbs a few ladders, then pauses. He giggles to himself as Nichols appears. Lily and Tom dash down a corridor. They twist, then dash down more ladders. Stopping, Tom presses his hand to his ear. In the ballroom, a curtain swings slowly through the mud. Small ripples nudge cups and napkins, as the settling sand covers the rugs and benches. Lily and Tom step into another corridor. At the far end, a small cat leans against a pillar. Sand spills down the ladders, and then they charge toward the cat. Fog blows from an overhead vent. Tom lifts the cat, then notices as mud leaks in from seams. They turn and rush back up the corridor. They pause as sand floods into the corridor ahead of them. As they sprint in the opposite direction, a gardener, the cat's caretaker, enters the corridor. The gardener snatches the cat from Tom, then shoves Tom against a pillar. The gardener dashes off with the cat, and Tom and Lily bolt after him. The gardener grabs a backpack, then gawks at the window, which shatters. Sand floods in, toppling the gardener. Sand floods after them as they barrel down the corridor. A gust knocks them down, and flowing sand sweeps them away. Sand spills around them as chandeliers dim. Tom grapples against the rush toward a ladder. They pull themselves along a pillar toward the ladder. Tom nudges Lily through the chest-deep sand toward the railing. Lily clutches the railings and climbs to another sealed door. Tom rattles the door as the sand accumulates beneath them. The sand tickles their toes. A valet rushes past them. The valet retreats for them. He tests several codes in the door, as sand swirls around them. The sand climbs to their knees. Fog explodes nearby. The valet fiddles with the codes and then drops below the surface. Clutching the door with one hand, he stretches for the codes. Tom snatches the codes, then emerges. Tom extends around the door with the code, but misses the slot. He slips the code into the slot. He turns the code. Lily unlocks the door.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Cal slips on a broken banister but quickly recovers, grabs his gun, and chases after Jack and Rose. They navigate staircases and waist-high water with Cal in pursuit. Despite his efforts, Cal's gun eventually runs out of bullets, leaving him amidst rising waters. Meanwhile, Jack and Rose maneuver through a dining room, where water engulfs everything. They find a small boy in a passageway and take him as water pours down. Sparks from overhead and water gushing through cracks heighten the urgency. They return up the passage, encountering the boy's father, who snatches the boy and flees, causing chaos. Water bursts through a door, sweeping everyone off their feet, while Jack and Rose struggle against the current toward a stairwell. They push against the water, climbing to a locked gate. A steward tries to unlock it as water rises, but fumbles the keys. Jack retrieves the keys underwater, manages to unlock the gate, and Rose opens it as they escape the deluge.
